external_references.description: Kirill Boychenko. (2025, July 14). Contagious Interview Campaign Escalates With 67 Malicious npm Packages and New Malware Loader. Retrieved October 19, 2025.

objects.description: [XORIndex Loader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1248) has exfiltrated victim data using HTTPS POST requests to its C2 servers.(Citation: Socket BeaverTail XORIndex HexEval Contagious Interview July 2025)
